verses.verse: יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> The LORD מָ֭לָךְ <WH4427> reigneth יִרְגְּז֣וּ <WH7264> tremble עַמִּ֑ים <WH5971> let the people יֹשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> he sitteth כְּ֝רוּבִ֗ים <WH3742> [between] the cherubims תָּנ֥וּט <WH5120> be moved הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> let the earth

יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> The LORD בְּצִיּ֣וֹן <WH6726> in Zion גָּד֑וֹל <WH1419> [is] great וְרָ֥ם <WH7311> and he [is] high ה֝֗וּא <WH1931> he עַל־ <WH5921> above כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָֽעַמִּֽים׃ <WH5971> above all the people
יוֹד֣וּ <WH3034> Let them praise שִׁ֭מְךָ <WH8034> name גָּד֥וֹל <WH1419> thy great וְנוֹרָ֗א <WH3372> and terrible קָד֥וֹשׁ <WH6918> [for] it [is] holy הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וְעֹ֥ז <WH5797> strength מֶלֶךְ֮ <WH4428> The king's מִשְׁפָּ֪ט <WH4941> judgment אָ֫הֵ֥ב <WH157> also loveth אַ֭תָּה <WH859> You כּוֹנַ֣נְתָּ <WH3559> thou dost establish מֵישָׁרִ֑ים <WH4339> equity מִשְׁפָּ֥ט <WH4941> judgment וּ֝צְדָקָ֗ה <WH6666> and righteousness בְּיַעֲקֹ֤ב ׀ <WH3290> in Jacob אַתָּ֬ה <WH859> You עָשִֽׂיתָ׃ <WH6213> thou executest

רֽוֹמְמ֡וּ <WH7311> Exalt יְה֘וָ֤ה <WH3068> ye the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <WH430> our God וְֽ֭הִשְׁתַּחֲווּ <WH7812> and worship לַהֲדֹ֥ם <WH1916> stool רַגְלָ֗יו <WH7272> be able to endure קָד֥וֹשׁ <WH6918> [for] he [is] holy הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

מֹ֘שֶׁ֤ה <WH4872> Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֨ן ׀ <WH175> and Aaron בְּֽכֹהֲנָ֗יו <WH3548> among his priests וּ֭שְׁמוּאֵל <WH8050> and Samuel בְּקֹרְאֵ֣י <WH7121> among them that call שְׁמ֑וֹ <WH8034> upon his name קֹרִ֥אים <WH7121> they called אֶל־ <WH413> upon יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> upon the LORD וְה֣וּא <WH1931> and He יַעֲנֵֽם׃ <WH6030> and he answered

בְּעַמּ֣וּד <WH5982> pillar עָ֭נָן <WH6051> unto them in the cloudy יְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> He spake אֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH413> about שָׁמְר֥וּ <WH8104> they kept עֵ֝דֹתָ֗יו <WH5713> his testimonies וְחֹ֣ק <WH2706> and the ordinance נָֽתַן־ <WH5414> [that] he gave לָֽמוֹ׃

יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֵינוּ֮ <WH430> our God אַתָּ֪ה <WH859> You עֲנִ֫יתָ֥ם <WH6030> Thou answeredst אֵ֣ל <WH410> thou wast a God נֹ֭שֵׂא <WH5375> that forgavest הָיִ֣יתָ <WH1961> become לָהֶ֑ם <WH1992> to them וְ֝נֹקֵ֗ם <WH5358> them though thou tookest vengeance עַל־ <WH5921> of עֲלִילוֹתָֽם׃ <WH5949> of their inventions

רֽוֹמְמ֡וּ <WH7311> Exalt יְה֘וָ֤ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <WH430> our God וְ֭הִֽשְׁתַּחֲווּ <WH7812> and worship לְהַ֣ר <WH2022> hill קָדְשׁ֑וֹ <WH6944> at his holy כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For קָ֝ד֗וֹשׁ <WH6918> [is] holy יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> for the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> our God
